statements: DELETE FROM insurance_claim WHERE policy_id = 12345 AND claimant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM insurance_claim WHERE claim_id = 100 AND policy_id = 200;
DELETE FROM insurance_claim WHERE claimant_name = 'John Doe' AND claim_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_holder_name = 'John Doe' AND claim_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_id = 1001 AND policy_number = 12345;
DELETE FROM claim_history WHERE claim_date < '2022-01-01' AND updated_by = 'Admin';
DELETE FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_name = 'Alice Smith';
